name: Passed & Present
description:
Content Warning: This game features grief and the loss of a loved one.

We recommend playing the game in full screen. If the game lags in full screen, please try downloading the Windows version below.

John arrives at his late grandpa’s empty mansion to pick up family heirlooms in the attic. He is not alone.

Controls

  • Arrows/WASD - Move
  • Z/Enter/Space - Interact
  • F - Toggle full screen, Windows build only

If you get stuck for whatever reason, you can use R to reload the current scene.

Credits
Team Lead, Artist, Writer - Danny Cragg
Programmer, Writer - Alex Cornellier
Artist - Harrison Dunn
Music - Jei
